Regular scheduled meetings of the city council are held the 2nd Tuesday of each month at 5:00 PM.
These meetings are held at 102 Clay St. in the council chambers. The public is encouraged to attend.

Regular Agenda
Special Agenda
Meeting Minutes

Agenda For City Council Meeting

The agenda for a regular scheduled city council meeting is published here by 5:00 P.M. on the Wednesday preceeding the meeting.

Agenda For City Council Meeting

The agenda for a special called city council meeting is published here within 3 business days of the meeting.
